participant_1.background:
I am so proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people.
i only buy convertible cars.
I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I enjoy making things for my family.

participant_2.background:
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.
I'm not a morning person, I like to take my time getting ready in the morning.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
i m a night owl , but i m an introvert so i don t go out much or anything.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.

content.text: Hey! What do you do for fun?
I like to watch tv, but I'm not really a morning person so I usually sleep in.
I like to sing, but I used to be really shy about it.
What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing classic rock, and I love Bon Jovi.
Oh, I love Bon Jovi too! I have a lot of their songs on my playlist.
I've been trying to learn to play the guitar, but it's hard!
I've always wanted to learn to play the guitar too, but I'm not very coordinated.
I'm not very coordinated either, but I'm having a lot of fun learning.
I'm glad you're having fun! I think it's great that you're trying to learn something new.
Thanks! I'm trying to be more outgoing and try new things.
That's great! I'm trying to do the same thing.
We should be friends! We seem to have a lot in common.
